name: Color Match (am2020app)
description:
This game is a mini game. Color is the main point. User needs to find out the pair of block that have the same color in game.
Game have many funny back ground music and wallpaper for user. Such as : dance, x-mas.
There are a leaderboard to compare with other users. Leaderboard collect all user's scores on Android and IOS.
This is just a mini funny game. please enjoy and relax.
Feel free to feedback.
